questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A neon-lit column

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A tall column
C) A group of people
D) A piece of artwork

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A neon-lit column
C) A painting
D) A fountain

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) Windows and ceiling
D) A street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) Sand
C) A column with neon lights
D) A table

What color is prominently featured in the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red
D) Yellow

What type of lighting is used in the photo?
A) Natural light
B) Candlelight
C) Neon lighting
D) Fluorescent lighting

How many neon rings are visible on the column?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What color are the neon rings?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the shape of the column?
A) Square
B) Rectangular
C) Circular
D) Triangular

What can be seen through the windows in the background?
A) Trees
B) Ocean
C) Indoor lighting
D) Mountains

What is the texture of the column?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured
D) Patterned

What kind of windows are in the background?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Rectangular
D) Oval

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Daylight
B) Nighttime
C) Indoor artificial light
D) Sunset

What is the color of the ceiling?
A) White
B) Black
C) Blue
D) Red

How many sections does the column have?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the architectural feature of the building?
A) Columns with neon lights
B) Large chandeliers
C) Spiral staircases
D) Arched doorways

What is the color of the walls?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red
D) Beige

How is the column illuminated?
A) From the top
B) From the bottom
C) By surrounding neon rings
D) By overhead lights

What is the primary color of the column?
A) White
B) Grey
C) Black
D) Red
